testcase.name: TC004_Email_textbox'ina_girilen_email_domain_name_ve_top_level_domain_arasinda_"."_icermiyorsa_kayit_gerceklesmemeli_
testcase.system-out: When kullanici "global_trader_url" adresine gider...........................passed Then Seller Join Now butonuna tiklar........................................passed And Agent Seller butonuna tiklar............................................passed And Name textbox'ina "u_name" girer.........................................passed And Email textbox'ina "u_invalid_email6" girer..............................passed And Sub Domain textbox'ina "u_sub_domain" girer.............................passed And Mobile textbox'ina "u_mobile_number" girer..............................passed And Country drop down'a tiklar ve "u_country" secer.........................passed And State textbox'ina "u_state" girer.......................................passed And City textbox'ina "u_city" girer.........................................passed And Address textbox'ina "u_address" girer...................................passed And Enter Postal Code textbox'ina "u_postal_code" girer.....................passed And Categories drop down'a tiklar ve "u_categories" secer...................passed And Password textbox'ina "u_password" girer.................................passed And Registration butonuna tiklar ...........................................passed And Kayit gerceklesmez ve "Please Enter Valid Email Address" mesaji gorunur..passed
